posts.post_content:
Looking for the following Baltimore player/back combinations:

Adkins (Cycle and Polar Bear)
Cassidy (American Beauty, Cycle, Sweet Caporal)
Dessau (Cycle, Sweet Cap 25)
Dunn (American Beauty, Cycle, Sweet Cap Fact. 25, Tolstoi)
Hall (American Beauty)
Jackson (Cycle, EPDG, Sweet Cap 25)
Poland (American Beauty)
Slagle (Cycle)
Strang (Sovereign, Tolstoi)

Thanks!   Dave
Thank you to the board members who hooked me up with a few of the front/back combinations I needed...that was a huge help.  Still looking for more if you've got any!
